summary: Levante lives in a small city near Florence (Tuscany, Italy) and his life is plain and a bit boring, until the day the twister arrives: a bus with six Spanish flamenco dancers that will twist Levante and his family life.
cast: Leonardo Pieraccioni|Lorena Forteza|Barbara Enrichi|Massimo Ceccherini|Sergio Forconi|Tosca D'Aquino|Patrizia Corti|Benedetta Mazzini|Natalia Estrada|Paolo Hendel|Alessandro Haber|Ana Valeria Dini|Corinna Locastro|Pilar Marin|Alessio Caruso|Giovanni Ferreri|Giovanni Pellegrino|Jerry Potenza|Giuliano Grande|Mario Monicelli|Renzo Cantini|Giorgio Gianassi|Roberta Maggi|Pino Megale|Osvaldo Pieraccioni|Sergio Risso|Brunetto Salvini
